The irrigation design application is a tool that is meant to simplify the design procedures of irrigation system. You can do your design calculation whether you’re in office or in the field. The app has input and output futures. The design steps and equations required are also embedded in the app and therefore you don’t need to struggle in remembering all the formulas. Similarly, the tables for constants are also put in a database and you can easily retrieve.
